summary: Updated testimonials section title positioning and styling: 1) Changed title container from justify-center to justify-end to position it on the right side above Nastaran's card. 2) Split title text into two spans - 'درباره ما چی ' in dark blue (#22165E) and 'میگن؟' in pink (#EB55C8) to match design requirements. Title now aligns to the right and displays with pink accent on the question mark phrase.
current_status: Testimonials section title repositioned to right side and styled with pink accent on 'میگن؟'. Ready for browser testing.
